summary: This appears to be a brief email correspondence from an Associate Warden at a New York correctional facility, following up to confirm receipt of documentation related to Jeffrey Epstein. The document suggests official communication regarding Epstein case materials.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified by their title, following up to confirm receipt of Jeffrey Epstein documentation.

events.title: Documentation Receipt Follow-up
events.description: An Associate Warden sends a follow-up email to confirm receipt of Jeffrey Epstein documentation.

keyFacts: An Associate Warden at a New York correctional facility was involved in correspondence regarding Jeffrey Epstein documentation.
The communication occurred on September 23, 2021, which is after Epstein's death in 2019.
The document suggests ongoing official handling or review of Epstein-related materials by correctional authorities.
